metadata.title: CVE-2021-29987 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: After requesting multiple permissions, and closing the first permissionpanel, subsequent permission panels will be displayed in a differentposition but still record a click in the default location, making itpossible to trick a user into accepting a permission they did not want to.*This bug only affects Firefox on Linux. Other operating systems areunaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 91 and Thunderbird < 91.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
